title: Video download helper with Firefox add-on stopped working – driving me bonkers
content:
System Linux mint 18.2 Sonya

Video DownloadHelper Version 7.4.0 Browser locale: en-US Production build Built on Tue Dec 15 2020 17:14:16 GMT+0100 (Central European Standard Time) Build options: browser=firefox

I used to be able to record mainly music from YouTube and some other sources using video download helper with the Firefox add-on.

It used to direct me sometimes to using the companion app, then at other times not.

The thing is now that it starts to record with a blue numbered disc showing. It gets almost to the end of the download, then the circle turns red and I get the following type of error messages – see below.

I also do not have the same layout on the 3 colour disc download helper button.

Updated the add-on but cannot find any specific help.

Would be very grateful for a simple fix, or complicated, that – OR, is there a better product??

Seasons greetings


Failed converting "youtube.com/watch?v=Tff9mJN-ZZU"

/opt/net.downloadhelper.coapp/converter/build/linux/64/ffmpeg: /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libm.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.27' not found (required by /opt/net.downloadhelper.coapp/converter/build/linux/64/libavfilter.so.7) /opt/net.downloadhelper.coapp/converter/build/linux/64/ffmpeg: /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.27' not found (required by /opt/net.downloadhelper.coapp/converter/build/linux/64/libavformat.so.58) /opt/net.downloadhelper.coapp/converter/build/linux/64/ffmpeg: /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libm.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.27' not found (required by /opt/net.downloadhelper.coapp/converter/build/linux/64/libavcodec.so.58) /opt/net.downloadhelper.coapp/converter/build/linux/64/ffmpeg: /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libm.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.27' not found (required by /opt/net.downloadhelper.coapp/converter/build/linux/64/libvpx.so.6) /opt/net.downloadhelper.coapp/converter/build/linux/64/ffmpeg: /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libm.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.27' not found (required by /opt/net.downloadhelper.coapp/converter/build/linux/64/libaom.so.0)

title: firefox audio plays audio on non-bluetooth device
content: Firefox plays audio (eg. of youtube videos) on the motherboard sound device even if there is a bluetooth headset connected via bluetooth USB dongle. Microsoft Edge and VLC plays audio on bluetooth video any user intervention. The win10 mixer shows that firefox is playing on audio on the non-bluetooth device and doesn't on bluetooth. I can't find a setting in Firefox to change this.

title: RoboForm Restore Previous Version Add-On
content:
Hi I have used Roboform for many years. It used to be integrated in the top row of web browsers, but due to changes in Firefox (among others) it then used a separate taskbar that appeared at the bottom of the screen. This was simple to use, but did require manually turning off at times due to some websites using the bottom of the screen for chats etc. This has just been automatically updated and is now unworkable! I only have access to one identity not four, no automatic login (such as this forum) and the need to click, click, click, click, click, etc. just to get access to a login that I now have to edit, and cut and paste manually. As it is no longer fit for purpose, I want to install a previous version with the taskbar. Does anyone have a link where I can download it from?

In the meantime, I have asked RoboForm how I can extract the data so I can move onto something that works. They have declined to reply.

Can someone please advise how I can automatically transfer the existing data into Firefox and use this for my automated ogin information. I can then use the same on my mobile devices.

Alternatively, can someone offer an alternative solution to RoboForm that works with browers and syncs to mobile devices? Regards
creator: etruscanhouse

title: YouTube not working properly on Firefox
content:
Been having this issue for the last few weeks where Firefox just won't load YouTube properly. In particular, livestreams won't play, chat always show as "disconnected from chat" and I can't even access the profile menu (clicking on my profile pic on the top left just shows a loading icon forever).

Tried the following without any luck: 1. Safemode 2. Clearing all cache 3. Refresh firefox (When I first did a refresh, it started working again, then I went to sleep and the next morning the same problem is back again)

Any help would be much appreciated.
creator: nekonron

title: Boomarks Default Save Folder
content: Hi I am currently having to rebuild Windows from scratch (again!) and can't work out how to set my Bookmark folder to duplicate th Windows 'Favorites' folder location. The reason for this is due to Windows forcing Edge to link to its apps despite not being the default program/app set as well as the legacy location from booting into different environments. I have tried the recommended add-ons but none of them just allow me to set the new location, which in my case is simply 'D:\Favorites'. I have done this with my old install (the one I'm using now) but want to set the same folder in my new install. Does anyone know of any settings, registry fix or simple change I might have applied to the old install. Thanks in advance

title: Mozilla Addon Syncing
content: I installed idm extension on firefox for windows. Since I was logged in to the firefox with firefox account, when I tried logging in to the firefox on linux this idm extension got enabled over there as well. Since IDM software is only available for windows it doesn't make any sense to have that extension on linux. So I removed it on linux firefox. What syncing did is it removed it on firefox on windows as well. Now I want it on firefox on win but not on firefox on linux. What should I do?

title: Old Firefox Data does not import
content:
Had to refresh Firefox after a multiple number of tab crashes, all my info went into a Old Firefox Data folder. I have followed the steps to import the whole fire back into the new profile but it is not working. I have followed the steps listed here : https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1212433

and also here:

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1270211

to no avail. the only thing that managed to transfer over was some bookmarks, but not all of them and it did not bring them to my toolbar either. my bookmarks are whatever but i really need my saved logins/passwords back. Any help is appreciated, thanks in advance.
creator: m.argueta47

title: Firefox only lists one camera device
content:
I am running Firefox Version 84.0.1 on Windows 10 1909.

Whenever I attempt to use a camera in Firefox, it defaults to one and does not allow you to select any others in the list. I have two other camera devices on this computer, but neither of them are ever listed.

I use OBS as a video mixer and then Voicemeeter as an audio mixer. Firefox has no trouble selecting between the 8 audio input devices on this computer, so I'm not sure why video would be any different.

I need Firefox to use OBS's virtual camera for school and work, but it always defaults to Epoccam now. It used to default to my NDI Virtual Input, which I was able to use (but with some issues) to get video out of OBS, it just added an extra hop.

title: '400 Bad CSRF Token' when I try to log in to Reddit
content:
The last 2 days, when I've tried to log in to my account at reddit, it returns:

400 Bad CSRF Token

Access is denied. This server can not verify that your cross-site request forgery token belongs to your login session. Either you supplied the wrong cross-site request forgery token or your session no longer exists. This may be due to session timeout or because browser is not supplying the credentials required, as can happen when the browser has cookies turned off.

check_csrf_token(): Invalid token

I have a subreddit to moderate, so I'm using Opera for that. I'd rather use Firefox. It happens in safe mode too.

creator: ChaoticCube

title: downloads when a new version of firefox is installed
content:
Every time there is a new release of firefox, i go through the same process... I install the release, all is well. i download a file and firefox does it, however it is not to where i want it. it downloads to the download folder.

It is then that I realize that the release changed my options of asking me where to download the file. If a USER has specified to be asked where to download the file, this should not be changed with every release change.

How would you like it if every release asked you what language you would like???

Once the settings are made in options, the new release should not modify it to what firefox thinks it should be.

Thanks
creator: bobpatbp
